attributes.action: Consider the adoption as UK Government policy of the Kyoto2 framework for a second Kyoto Protocol, as described at http://www.kyoto2.org
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Kyoto2 is a framework for a second Kyoto Protocol which aims to be global, practical, equitable and economically efficient while raising substantial funds for climate impacts mitigation, adaptation and low carbon energy research and development.
